channel.title: Alot of things not working, but i don't get any errors?

item.title: Alot of things not working, but i don't get any errors?
item.dc:creator: @Npwnage Npwnage
item.description:
@Npwnage wrote:

When I changed the XP for smithing in client.java I edited the code for the exp for bars to this:

public int smithXP(int barType, int barAmount) { if (barType == 2349) return barAmount*1000000; if (barType == 2351) return barAmount*1000000; if (barType == 2353) return barAmount*1000000; if (barType == 2359) return barAmount*8000000; if (barType == 2361) return barAmount*1600000; if (barType == 2363) return barAmount*3200000; if (barType == 2893) return barAmount*6400000; if (barType == 2357) return barAmount*1280000;
Now i dont get any XP for smithing bars into items. Can someone please help me?
Also I need help with the exit message: sendQuest("Oh no, you're leaving my server", 2450); sendQuest("Come back soon to Lawlscape", 2451); sendQuest("Thanks for playing. -Npwnage", 2452); if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("topknight18")) {

Read full topic
item.source: Alot of things not working, but i don't get any errors?
